company.title: The Iluminatus Company
company.description: The Iluminatus Company is a small independent game development studio focused on creating challenging experiences for hardcore players. The studio combines demanding gameplay mechanics with a strong sense of humor. Despite its very small team, every project is developed with great care and attention to detail, emphasizing personality and passion in every aspect of the game.
company.history: The Iluminatus Company was founded in 2025 as a personal project. The studio was created with the goal of developing challenging games with a strong identity, while maintaining an independent approach. The team currently consists of the main creator, along with a small group of friends who help with playtesting and contribute ideas during development.
